sheet.name: en
sheet.text: Look at the size of this... what-do-you-call-it? Satellite dish? It's for communications, right?
Yeah. I've seen all sorts of crazy high-tech ancient tech across both islands.
How can something this old be this advanced? It's sturdy too. I punched it and it didn't move at all.
Knux... don't punch the ruins. Once I find Tails, maybe he can use them to figure out what happened here.
Hey! I already discovered that it's sturdier than anything we've encountered. I don't think this material is from this world.
